main.name: Cindy Pham
main.description: Full Stack Web Developer | Game Developer | Android Application Developer
main.bio: I am currently an AI Quality Controller at TELUS International. I have a Bachelor's in Computer Science and an Associate's in Mathematics. My hobbies include playing the piano, guitar, and violin, producing music, building Legos, and developing games. I am currently seeking a full-time role as a software engineer.

education.courses: Matrix Calculations, Probability & Statistics, Data Structures, Discrete Mathematics, Computer Architecture, Information Retrieval, Operating Systems, Algorithms, Computer Networks, Network Security & Privacy, Modern Web Applications, Game Technology, Data Management, Software Engineering, Competitive Programming, Object-Oriented Programming, Ethical Foundations of CS
education.clubs: K-Beat Dance Team, Electronic Game Developers Society, Information & Systems Security Society, Texas Music Producers, Longhorn Gaming, Society of Asian Scientists and Engineers, IEEE Computer Society

work.title: AI Quality Controller
work.description: Evaluate quality of AI-generated responses to user queries based on pre-defined guidelines; Analyze and provide feedback to improve user experience; Review and rate relevance of result blocks returned from search engine queries

work.title: Winter Break Intern
work.description: Work with team of 4 to provide quality assurance for DeepNLP software product; Automate information retrieval and document classification on large, unstructured datasets; Present metrics based on AI's performance accuracy and provided feedback on user experience
